Event.name: Risk_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>An Asset is in a particular Situation, which has a likelihood of leading to or inviting a Harmful_event which will negatively affect the Asset.</def-root>

Arg.name: Asset
Arg.definition: <def-root>Something judged to be desirable or valuable which might be lost or damaged.</def-root>

Arg.name: Harmful_event
Arg.definition: <def-root>An event that may occur or a state which may hold which could result in the loss of or damage to the <fen>Asset</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Situation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Situation</fen> under which the <fen>Asset</fen> is safe or unsafe.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the actual level of security from the expected value given the <fen>Asset</fen>, the <fen>Situation</fen>, and state indicated by the target itself.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the degree of safeness holds.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> at which the degree of safeness holds.</def-root>
